title: League of Legend is:
body: A single player game which matches you up with 4 other 'team mates' to form 5 vs 5 and in this game, you will require skills of **Politics** and **Saltness**,  with those skills, you will be aiming at _**one goal**_, which is to blame other person with improper logic and knowledge to avoid other people insulting you with all the sweats they have and how much they love to salt other people.
